Hello community,

i need a jump-index (A...Z) on the right side of my tableview.

Like this one:
http://developer.xamarin.com/guides/ios/user_interface/tables/part_2_-_populating_a_table_with_data/#Adding_an_Index

Code of MvvmLight class "ObservableTableViewController.cs" has a commentar "In the current implementation, only one section is supported". I created my own class ObservableTableViewControllerExtended, with override for NumberOfSections, RowsInSection, SectionIndexTitles.

But I get at deploy an exception:
"objective c exception: attempt to insert row 1 into section 0 but there are only 1 rows after update in section 0".

Please help.

best regards, julia
